trans-unit.source: Displays a collection of child activity designers in a preview strip and, when a child designer is selected on the preview strip, displays the selected activity designer in preview or edit mode on a workflow design surface.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ActivityPreviewDesigner is a sequential activity designer that displays all of its child activity designers in a strip that appears at the top of its design surface.
When one of the child designers is selected, its representation is displayed in a preview window that the activity preview designer hosts below the strip.
The ActivityPreviewDesigner has a preview mode and an edit mode.
Preview mode allows the user to view the entire representation of the selected designer without scrolling; however, preview mode does not allow the user to modify the selected activity designer.
Edit mode allows the user to modify the selected activity designer.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that allows the designer to adjust its UI for users with disabilities.

If the initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> creates an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.

An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that allows the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> to adjust its UI for users who have impairments.
Gets a collection of activity designers that are displayed by the activity preview designer.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> read-only collection that contains the designers displayed by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
Gets or sets the index of the current drop target in the array of drop targets returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetDropTargets*>.
The CurrentDropTarget set operation sets the target in the preview strip that appears at the top of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
An integer that represents the index of the current drop target for the designer.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release the managed resources; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Ensures that the specified activity designer is visible on the workflow design surface.

EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner verifies that all activity designers in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, and their children, are displayed in the preview strip at the top of the designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> for which to ensure visibility on the workflow design surface.
containedDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> do not contain null references (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), FirstSelectableObject will return the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> property contains a null reference (`Nothing`), FirstSelectableObject will return the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
An <xref:System.Object> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
Returns an array of rectangles that bound the activity designer's connectors.

GetConnectors returns an empty array if one or more of the following conditions occur: - The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> is not the active designer on the workflow design surface.
- The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> does not contain any child activity designer.
- The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> is not expanded on the workflow design surface.
- <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> is set to `true`.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that defines the bounds of all connectors in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
Returns an array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
If `dropPoint` is in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> preview strip, GetDropTargets returns the possible drop targets in the strip.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.

Since users can only navigate horizontally in the preview pane of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, GetNextSelectableObject only recognizes <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection>.
The current object in the navigation order.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the direction in which designer navigation occurs.
The first selectable that follow obj in the navigation order.
Gets a read-only collection of glyphs that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
Glyphs contains the collection of glyphs to display in the preview strip at the top of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"></xref> read-only collection that contains the glyphs associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
Gets or sets the text to display when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> contains no other activity designers.
The HelpText set operation adds text to the preview strip at the top of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
A string that contains the text to display on the designer surface
Returns information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> at the specified coordinates on the workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.

A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> at the specified coordinates
Initializes the designer used by the specified activity.
This sets up listening to the selection change event for the activity designer associated with `activity`.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> for which to initialize the designer.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activity designer is visible in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> is `true` and the preview window is set to preview mode, IsContainedDesignerVisible returns `false`.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to check.
if containedDesigner is visible; otherwise, .
containedDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> do not contain null references (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), LastSelectableObject returns the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.

If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A> contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), LastSelectableObject returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the last designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
Loads the view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> from a binary stream.
The <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> used to restore the designer view state.
reader contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic)
The designer host associated with the designer is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).
Gets or sets the location of the designer in logical coordinates on the workflow design surface.
The Location set operation updates the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> and all child designers it contains.

A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the x- and y-coordinates associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
Notifies the designer that the number of activities contained in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> has changed.
`listChangeArgs` contains the activity designers that have been added and removed from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.

OnContainedActivitiesChanged updates the designer verbs associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> and modifies the designer layout on the workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
listChangeArgs contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor enters the bounds of the designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.

OnLayoutSize determines the size of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> preview strip that displays the collection of child activity designers and the preview window that displays the selected activity designer.
OnLayoutSize also determines the size of the preview window depending on whether the designer is in edit or preview mode.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> returns `false`, OnLayoutSize returns the base implementation inherited from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the new size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> when the user double-clicks on the surface of the activity designer.
When the user double-clicks in the preview window OnMouseDoubleClick enables edit mode on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> when the user presses the mouse button down while the pointer is in designer bounds.
If the user presses the mouse button down while the cursor is in the preview window, edit mode is turned on for the designer.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Notifies the designer when the user moves the mouse cursor out of designer bounds.
Notifies the designer when the user releases the mouse button in the designer bounds.
When the user releases the mouse button over the preview strip, the scrollable button changes to a minimum scroll arrow.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Draws the visual representation of the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> at design time.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> that its associated theme has changed.
OnThemeChange not only updates the theme property settings for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, it also renders the new settings to the preview window.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that contains the updated theme property settings.
Gets the designer to preview in the preview section of the activity designer.

If no designer is selected in the preview strip section of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, PreviewedDesigner returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to display in the preview section of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
Updates the configuration errors associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
RefreshDesignerActions not only updates the actions associated with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, it also renders the new views to the preview window.
Updates the view displayed in the preview window of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> must be set to `true` for RefreshPreview to perform view updates.
Stores the current view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> to a binary stream.

SaveViewState saves the currently selected activity designer in the preview strip and, if <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> returns `true`, the contents of the preview window.
The <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> to which the current designer view state is stored.
writer contains null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the activity preview should be displayed in the designer.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the activity preview in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the collection of verbs to associate with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.

An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection"></xref> that contains the verbs associated with <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
